# stacserver

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of stacserver is to provide an STAC API server to R environment.

## Installation

You can install the development version of stacserver from [GitHub](https://github.com/rolfsimoes/stacserver) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rolfsimoes/stacserver")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(stacserver)
## basic example code
```
